pages.text: In order to make a Shell, you'll need a Nacre.

pages.name: Shell
pages.text: In order to have your Nacre construct a Shell, you will need to build this multiblock, set Nacre's movement mode to stay then right click on her with a pickaxe in your hand.

pages.title: Creating a Pearl
pages.text: In order to use Shell, you will need to place the Shell over a block of White Gem essence, then insert 16 Gravel at the top, 16 Sand on the left, 16 Clay Balls on the right, and a Chroma of your choice at the bottom.$(br2)As time passes it'll slowly drain these materials, and once it's finished it will create a Pearl for you to collect.

pages.title: Pearl Upgrades
pages.text: When inserting materials into your Shell machine, you can use higher quantities of Gravel, Sand and Clay Balls to get higher quality Pearls.$(br2)Use x32 of materials for a standard quality Pearl, and use x64 of materials for a high quality or perfect Pearl.
